data.description: Binary Data Conversion using C Types
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
I already tried to register the module namespace last year, but I
    didn't get any feedback.
    (http://archive.develooper.com/modules@perl.org/msg11462.html)

    The module is on CPAN since August 2002. It outperforms the only
    similar module, C::Include, in every aspect.

    I gave a talk about the module at this year's German Perl Workshop.
    You can find the presentation slides (in German) here (if my server
    is up ;-) : http://mhx.dyndns.org/perl/workshop/2003/cbc/
